project

Class DataContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.DataContainer

  • public class DataContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    DataContainer est la classe représentant un fichier de données. Un objet DataContainer est caractérisé par les informations suivantes :
    • Une date.
    • Un nom de variables.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataContainer(java.lang.String csvFileName)
      Returns an object DataContainer that reads a csv formatted file with coma separator The csvFileName argument is a string of the filename.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataContainer

        public DataContainer(java.lang.String csvFileName)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Returns an object DataContainer that reads a csv formatted file with coma separator The csvFileName argument is a string of the filename.

        This method always returns immediately, whether or not the image exists. When this applet attempts to draw the image on the screen, the data will be loaded. The graphics primitives that draw the image will incrementally paint on the screen.

        Parameters:
        csvFileName - filename of the csvfile to read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of errors
